1.title: Small wedding part 1
1.plot: Adam and Sapir are getting married at a Zimmer up north, and everybody comes to the wedding including those who were not supposed to.

2.title: Small wedding part 2
2.plot: Adam and Sapir are getting married at a Zimmer up north, and everybody comes to the wedding including those who were not supposed to.

3.title: Promotion part 1
3.plot: Silvan plays backgammon with Yakov the neighbor, Shai's phone's facial recognition doesn't work and Shani was promoted at work.

4.title: Promotion part 2
4.plot: Shai is not handling Shani's promotion so well, Sapir is not handling Riki so well and Liri is not handling the judicial system so well.

5.title: Diformation
5.plot: Shai and Shani go on a weekend in Eilat for management team formation with Shani's company. Meanwhile, their girls move from one grandmother to the other.

6.title: Lag BaOmer
6.plot: Every kid in the city is making a bonfire at the same yard - 50 meters from Riki and Pinchas's home, and right after the cleaner was done.

7.title: Scattergories
7.plot: Shani can't make it on time to Kiddush coming back from work, meanwhile the Hassons play Scattergories.

8.title: Excuses
8.plot: Everyone has excuses why they missed the opening of Liri's trial and Sapir's grandmother's Shiva, but the excuses mix.

9.title: Don't Say Anything to Efrat
9.plot: Efrat comes to Israel in secret, only Shani knows about it. Everyone is trying to guess why Mike and her have separated.

10.title: Story
10.plot: Riki and Pinchas fought, and everyone can sense it. What happened during the night between Pinchas and Liri? And why is everyone sharing Sapir's story?

11.title: uRobot
11.plot: Shai and Shani gave Rachel and Silvan a new robot, but it escapes. Moshe walked in on Efrat during a shower while she was staying with him and Orna.

12.title: Austria Astoria
12.plot: Shai and Shani lie to everyone, so instead of traveling to Austria go to the Astoria hotel in Tel Aviv for the weekend. Pinchas tries to broadcast nightly music on the radio and safeguard the girls' bangs.

13.title: Episode #5.13
13.plot: The Hassons are preparing to a video call from America, and competes with past stories about whose mother in-law is the worst: Riki Rosen or Mike's mother.

1.title: Babysitter's Big Brother
1.plot: Shay and Shani try to clear some personal time, so they leave the girls with a new babysitter for the first time. Can they not check on the girls every minute? What does Silvan want to hide from everyone?

2.title: Huge Mistake
2.plot: So far everything is going okay. One Shabat with the Hasons and one Shabat with the Rosens. But. Riki has a small request: Pinhas and her are planning a weekend up north, so they'd like to switch the Shabats. Shouldn't be a problem, right?

3.title: Happy Itzik
3.plot: Just before the Shabbat dinner, the Hassons home computer is broken, Shay tries to find a partner for a good stake dinner, and the mystery of Happy Itzik is unsolved. But can the family overcome the difficulties and sit for dinner?

4.title: Holiday Evening
4.plot: The new year is nearing, starting the discussion regarding where the holiday would be celebrated. Will both families unite for the celebration?

5.title: Saturday Morning, Hard Day
5.plot: The Hasons are celebrating in a crowded event, Shai and Shani have no idea how much to give as a present.

6.title: Stockholm Syndrome
6.plot: Shai and Shani are on their way to Ricki and Pinchas, but see police cars in the direction to Shani's parents. Shani immediately is suspicious and rightfully so, a thief escaped the police and pays Rachel and Silvan a visit.

7.title: No Help
7.plot: Rachel is celebrating her 60th birthday at the age of 63. The entire family celebrates with her watching the game show in which Silvan and Rachel won a million shekels. At the same time, Shai and Shani can't decide on a gift.

8.title: I'll Go to the Forest
8.plot: The Rosens go on a picnic. Shai tries to find the perfect spot, Adam as a new girlfriend who's not the brightest and Michal and Itamar are fighting about Raz.

9.title: A Matter of Five Minutes
9.plot: Shai and his friend Tzvi get a "pass" to go to the beach with friends, they just need to drop Shani and the girls at the Hassons. Everything goes down hill from here.

10.title: Early Wedding
10.plot: Michal and Itamar are married for a couple of years, but only now get the wedding video due to a lawsuit. Tonight the family gathers to watch it, only the video editor retaliated as a response to the lawsuit.

11.title: Lice
11.plot: Some expected and some unexpected guests are coming to Friday night dinner. Shani and Shai brought lice and Meirav brought a new boyfriend, everybody is excited, yet, suspicious.

12.title: On the Head of the Year
12.plot: This year the Hassons have invited Shai's parents and his brother Adam for the new year evening celebration. Silvan hates the holidays, Meirav is excited for the new bachelor brother and Rachel is due for a surprise from her guest.

13.title: Painting
13.plot: Shai and Shani come for Shabbat dinner with the Rosens, bachelor Adam also comes with a new date but this time the family is happy, it is Michal Amdurski, Riki is troubled by a drawing one of Shai and Shani's girls drew.

14.title: Hasson Towers
14.plot: Shai left Itamar for half an hour with Shani's family, when he came back all hell breaks loose. Shai is sure Itamar has something to do with it, as usual, and starts investigating.

15.title: Hammer and Nail
15.plot: Shai and Shani celebrate Sukkot with Shai's family. While the men try to build the Sukka the women prepare decorations and gossip. But the preparations make everybody loose their holiday spirit.

16.title: Terrorista
16.plot: Alin's uncle comes for a visit at the Hassons a week after being nominated to a senior official in the Russian government. The family is very excited, but have a surprise coming.

17.title: Uncle Shmuel
17.plot: Riki finds out that uncle Shmuel, who lives abroad, has passed away. While waiting for a phone call about the will, Shani breaks an expensive vase that uncle Shmuel gave her. Riki uses that to tortures her, but will be surprised.

18.title: Bieber
18.plot: Shani is not happy, Shay bought a hamster without asking, and it's smelly. While she blows off steam to Rachel and Alin, Shay and Meni are challenged by Silvan to put new flooring to the bedroom. Everything goes south when Bieber is lost.

19.title: Indirect Connection
19.plot: Shay and Itamar beg their mother to babysit but Riki refuses. Later Shani and Michal get mad at them. Adam brings a new girlfriend but prepares his family to be surprised.

20.title: Bistro
20.plot: The kids take Silvan and Rachel to an expensive Bistro for a wedding anniversary celebration. But the Hassons cannot adapt to change - Rachel and Silvan's car falls apart, Orna and Moshe get lost and Meni and Alin are late.

21.title: God forbid and with god's help
21.plot: Riki tries to set Adam up with Einav, the daughter of Nili and Yoel from the country club. She's also a psychologist and a millionaire - Just perfect. While waiting for Adam, the family goes through a quick therapy session.

22.title: On One Foot
22.plot: It's Friday evening but Rachel has sprained her leg. She can't make dinner so Shani made meatballs, Alin and Orna side dishes, Meyrav a salad. Rachel watches from the sidelines but feels bad because she doesn't like resting.

23.title: Grandma Hannah
23.plot: Pinchas and Riki live in silence and fear in the last couple of days, grandma Hannah, Riki's mother, is staying with them and it seems like the tree is worst then the apple. Friday night dinner is here, but grandma Hannah has disappeared.

24.title: The Five Stages
24.plot: The Hassons are mourning. Meni on his hair, Rachel on a competing majlouf, Shai and Shani on lost money, Orna of lost pictures, and Meirav on a guy. Together they get through the five stages.

25.title: Plastics
25.plot: Riki decides that Friday dinner is the best time to tell Shani, she needs plastic surgeries. While Shani thinks about, Adam comes with his new girlfriend, who is the living proof that plastic surgery is the thing to do.

26.title: Reunion
26.plot: Silvan and Rachel planned a quite Friday night - until their kids came. Meyrav needs the apartment for a date, Orna is hiding from Moshe, Shai and Shani need a babysitter and Meni is stuck because he lost his keys.

27.title: Modern Classic
27.plot: Pinchas surprises Riki for their 42nd wedding anniversary, with a flight over the country. This produces a horror film staring the couple.

28.title: The Service
28.plot: Shani is celebrating her birthday with the Hassons, when Pinchas calls asking Shai to come due to an emergency. Riki's finger is stuck in the family heirloom service.

29.title: Chicory
29.plot: Shai and Shani arrive for dinner but instead of Shnitzels they get wheat grass and chicory. While everybody discusses Shai and Shani's relationship, as they are going on a date, Shai notices something's not right with Riki.

30.title: Mönchengladbach vs. Kaiserslautern
30.plot: Shai and Shani come for a visit at the Hassons home and realize that Silvan, Rachel and Meirav are not talking to each other. The reason is black Wednesday and a lottery ticket.

31.title: One surprise a day is enough
31.plot: Shlomo, Riki's twin brother, comes for a visit. The brothers have always heard their mother say "I wish you could be like uncle Shlomo". Shlomo, a dull bank clerk, comes to Friday night dinner with a pink suit and an announcement.

32.title: Born to be miserable
32.plot: Meirav passed an audition in the "Born to sing" reality show and the family prepares for the film crew to come. Meanwhile, they enjoy the Karaoke machine they got.

33.title: The Tzvi
33.plot: Tzvi, Shai's friend, had a fight with his wife Yael.

34.title: The table is set
34.plot: Silvan and Rachel buy a new table on the internet.

35.title: A great mother
35.plot: What happens when Riki challenges Shani's mothering skills?

36.title: Bad movie
36.plot: Orna and Meirav go to Hollywood to surprise their sister.

37.title: Secrets
37.plot: Rachel discovers a secret about Silvan's past.

38.title: So called family
38.plot: Michal decides to resolve family problems in TV therapy.

39.title: Great
39.plot: Dinner at the Rosens started well. Everyone got along just great until the battery in Raz's game ran out. Itamar was upset and nobody understood what all the fuss is about until Raz spoke.

40.title: Burning man
40.plot: Meirav joins Shai and Shani's visit to the Rosens after a day at the beach. Riki is stressed because of the guest. Michal and Itamar are fighting and Meirav causes havoc everywhere.

41.title: Foreplay
41.plot: It was inevitable, Shai and Shani go to Friday night dinner and forget where they were going. On their way, the compare the preparations each family makes.

42.title: Late Shiv'a
42.plot: The Hassons visit the Rosens to give their condolences.

1.title: Lottery
1.plot: Shai and Shani go to the Hassons only to find out the Rosens won the lottery.

2.title: Bangs
2.plot: Shai and Shani have some medical tests to do, so Riki and Pinchas get the girls out at the end of the school day and on the way home get a haircut.

3.title: Sisu and Simkhu
3.plot: It's Shai and Shani's youngest daughter's birthday and the entire extended family is invited to the celebration.

4.title: Hagiga B'Snooker
4.plot: Meyrav moves back home and finds a pool table in her bedroom.

5.title: Shogun
5.plot: Pinchas was hit in his head and now believes he is the famous detective Pinchas Shogun .

6.title: Coffee
6.plot: Silvan get a free coffee machine with the expensive capsules, and the family is hooked.

7.title: Grandmother Hanna strikes again
7.plot: A year has passed since Grandma Hanna has passed and the family goes to the cemetery, in addition her challenging will is revealed.

8.title: Renovations
8.plot: Due to renovations at home, Shai, Shani and the girls move to the Hassons for 24 hours but stay for more.

9.plot: Moshe Katz decides to run a marathon and the entire Hasson family comes to support him, meanwhile Shani has started the ninth month of her pregnancy.

10.title: Ima Oy Ima
10.plot: Riki and Pinchas are visiting Riki's home country and someone must water the plants at exactly 5 PM. Will they accomplish the mission?

11.title: Thomas Edison Katz
11.plot: Moshe Katz sold his patent to a French company for millions of Euros so the Hassons are kissing up to him.

12.title: Efrat
12.plot: Efrat, Orna's twin sister, comes to her home country to visit her family. The Hassons are curious to know, why she's really here.

13.title: Our car
13.plot: Can you mix business and family? What happens when Silvan Hasson wants to buy Pinchas Rosens's car?

14.title: Matrufka
14.plot: Shai tries to evade dinner with his boss and Adam comes with someone who should be perfectly normal.

15.title: My Mother the General
15.plot: Shai is called to the army reserves and has to stay for the weekend. The Rosens come for a visit just when they go from status green to status red.

16.title: April fools
16.plot: April fools at the Hassons and everybody pranks everyone, especially pranks Moshe Katz.

17.title: Infidelity
17.plot: Riki caught Pinchas looking to closely at a Spencer Tunick photo, revealing a big surprise.

18.title: Things I wanted to say
18.plot: Meni's vocal choir comes to the Hassons home, and it is revealed who's Meirav's mythological ex.

19.title: One week left
19.plot: Everyone visits the Rosens and try to calm Shani down when there is only one week left before she's due to give birth.

20.title: Seret Leida
20.plot: Shani gave birth to a girl, and the Hassons sit down to watch the unedited movie of the birth that Shai filmed.

21.title: Visiting with the stars
21.plot: The Rosens and the Hassons come to the hospital to visit Shani, and find Hilla Nachshon in the bed next to her.

22.title: Lifney Shana
22.plot: Nearly one year has passed since Meirav was told by a Clairvoyant that she'll be married in one year. Will she find her groom in time?

23.title: Three and a Third
23.plot: The first time Shai and Shani bring their new born girl to dinner at the Rosens is also when Adam brings is date Maya Rubin from the show "Shalosh" to dinner.

24.title: DNA
24.plot: Riki thinks the new born baby is to beautiful so she wants to check who the father is.

25.title: Dreams
25.plot: Lets visit the dreams and nightmares of those who visited the Hassons on a particular Friday night.

26.title: Our mother Rachel
26.plot: Shai and Shani cannot agree on having a celebration for their daughter's birth, Orna and Moshe cannot agree on having a Bat Mitzva celebration for their daughter, Meirav was abandoned again and Silvan has nothing to wear. They all count on Rachel to solve their problems.

27.title: Ochel
27.plot: Shai and Shani started dieting just when Pinchas got a French chef to cook the Friday night dinner instead of Riki.

28.title: Ha-K'rav Al Ha-Va'ad
28.plot: Silvan is running for the control on the building's residents committee, everyone helps the campaign, except for Meirav who suspects that Moshe is unfaithful to Orna.

29.title: Sister
29.plot: After not talking for 30 years, Pinchas's sister comes for a visit in which we will find out who Adam's father is.

30.title: Aruha K'fula
30.plot: Shai and Shani have to make it to two dinners: Silvan is celebrating his birthday and Riki is finally hosting Fanny from the Country Club.

31.title: Southern exposure
31.plot: While her parents are on vacation at the dead sea, Meirav uses their apartment for a drawing class.

32.title: The biggest gambler
32.plot: Shani is trying to loose some pregnancy extra weight, makes everyone join a diet competition and mainly gamble on the winner.

33.title: Moshe Yes, Moshe No
33.plot: How should Shai and Shani's baby girl lay down when she has gas: On her stomach or on her back? And why is Moshe at the Rosens home?

34.title: Romeo and Juliet
34.plot: Shai and Shani tell the girls about Romeo and Juliet, the girls imagine their parents as the main characters.

35.title: Friday the 13th
35.plot: It's a grim, dark and mysterious Friday night, with thunderstorms and power breaks, in which we test the urban legends.

36.title: Stroller
36.plot: Silvan is babysitting the new baby in her fancy new stroller, while everybody's out.

37.title: Me and the gang
37.plot: Riki and Pinchas are hosting their family and their friends on the same night, only their friends are 2 hours early and expecting dinner.

38.title: Going on a holiday
38.plot: Shai and Shani compare with whose family it is more difficult to take a vacation abroad.

39.title: Equal share
39.plot: Pinchas and Riki Rosen are writing their will, Shai, Itamar and Adam are dealing with the realization that their parents will not always be there for them.

40.title: Brita Mitzva
40.plot: Orna and Moshe are celebrating their daughter's Bat Mitzva with Shai and Shani who are celebrating their daughter's Brita, so the Rosens, the Hassons and the Katzes are all together.

1.title: Persona non Grata part 1
1.plot: The Rosens have an unexpected guest, and is Rachel cheating on Silvan with her dreamy neighbor?

2.title: Persona non Grata part 2
2.plot: Once Silvan has left his home there is one mission: Getting him back home.

3.title: Yo Mama
3.plot: No Shnitzel or dinner tonight - Riki and Itamar are fighting, and Sapir volunteers to make dinner instead.

4.title: The Inn
4.plot: Meirav decided she also wants to host for dinner. The Hassons escape for their lives.

5.title: Karnit
5.plot: The Rosens deal with Itamar's date from hell. Shay is invited to dinner at Shani's boss's home.

6.title: A tale of two mountains
6.plot: Efrat and Mike come for a visit with a big surprise.

7.title: The arbitrator
7.plot: Itamar is dating an arbitrator of the mafia. Is the family going to get into trouble with them?

8.title: Mexican hairless
8.plot: Shay ran over Silvan and Rachel's neighbor's dog, a lawyer from the penthouse. Will he get out of it and his Meyrav pregnant?

9.title: The Seder Part 1
9.plot: 3 months before the Seder, the Rosens are already wandering where and with whom. Apparently there are invitations it is better to decline. Will it be a happy Passover Seder?

10.title: The Seder Part 2
10.plot: The Hassons and Sapir's parents come to the Rosens to have the Seder. Moshe brings a blessed celery.

11.title: Vichua
11.plot: What do the Rosens need to do to get a European passport? Shani and Sapir are taught the Shwednizan culture.

12.title: 3, 4, go to work
12.plot: Shai and Shani join the Hassons summit behind Meirav's back, to help her find a job.

13.title: The beacon
13.plot: Itamar wakes up in an unfamiliar place. And what happens to the Rosens when they realize Silvan Hasson was given the honor of lighting one of the beacons in this year's Independence day at mount Hertzel?

14.title: Dinner
14.plot: The Rosens are getting ready for dinner but the heat as usual is outside the pots. Is Riki ignoring Shani? Is Adam dumping Sapir?

15.title: Who is a Jew?
15.plot: Silvan considers agreeing to the building's renovation plan, Shay discovers his daughter is a believer and Meirav has a date.

16.title: Congratulations
16.plot: How do the Rosens celebrate a birthday and what will they serve for dinner? Itamar finally moves out of his parents home.

17.title: Nazdarovia
17.plot: Alin makes a pilot for the Russian speaking channel, about the different Diasporas in Israel. She hosts the Rosens, the Hassons and Dudu Aharon.

18.title: Tests
18.plot: Shai and Shani try to figure out what Riki really thinks about Shani. Riki tests Sapir's patience.

19.title: Bat Mitzvush
19.plot: Efrat celebrates her daughter's Bat Mitzvush by taking the entire family to Jerusalem by bus.

20.title: Renovation
20.plot: Shai and Pinchas are in pain after a tennis match at the country club, and Itamar wants to renovate his childhood room.

21.title: A child for rent
21.plot: Alin, Shani and Orna argue who's going to lend her daughter to Meirav, who wants to show her date she is motherly.

22.title: The name of the game
22.plot: The Rosens find a game Shai and Itamar invented as kids. Riki tells Shani about the gift she received from Sapir's parents for Passover.

23.title: The format
23.plot: Moshe and his friend Selek are directing, producing and shooting a reality show about Friday night dinner.

24.title: Benefit
24.plot: Riki organizes a benefit at the country club, but Pinchas is sick at this particular evening and someone needs to stay with him.

25.title: Defensive driving
25.plot: Surprisingly the Shabbat events help Shai pass his defensive driving test.

26.title: Miryamale
26.plot: The romance that will make your mother crazy: Itamar has a thing for his mother's childhood friend who comes for a visit all of a sudden.

27.title: Operation D
27.plot: Silvan tells the therapist about the agony Meirav gives the family with "Operation D" to get a partner.

28.title: It is burning
28.plot: Riki and Pinchas are at the dead sea again and Itamar burns their apartment. Adam, Sapir, Moshe, Alin, Shai and Shani help him.

29.title: Unter Putz of the parcellation
29.plot: The shower in Shai and Shani's home is broken so Shai is forced to shower at the Hassons. The Hassons say it's because they didn't have a house warming party.

30.title: The volcan neighbor
30.plot: The Rosens have a new neighbor, a genetics professor. Is Riki having an affair with him? Are eggplants which tastes like liver like pumpkin which tastes like Schnitzel?

31.title: Kippur
31.plot: The last 25 minutes of Kippur at the Hassons. This time, on top of the fast, Meirav spent the day in absolute silence.

32.title: The Formica wedding
32.plot: Shai and Shani are celebrating 12 years together (minus 2 months), and Itamar falls in-love again.

33.title: Insta Shay
33.plot: Shai and Meni are competing for likes on Instagram. The rest of the family is competing for giving the best photo theme.

34.title: Little Shvidniza
34.plot: Shani and Sapir decided the Rosens will eat good food tonight. Will Riki find out what's going on in her kitchen?

35.title: Acupuncture
35.plot: Meirav studies Acupuncture and practices on the Hassons as preparation for her final exam. Orna tests on herself a medicine that Shantal was given.

36.title: Pilpel meter
36.plot: The Rosens got a people meter and from now on will determine the ratings. In addition they received a painting the Nazis stole from their family in Europe.

37.title: Intervention
37.plot: The families gather at the Hassons home for an intervention, to stop Shai addiction to coupons and sales.

38.title: The Martyrs
38.plot: Shai and Shani get a flat tire on their way to their daughter's show. Who's going to come to their rescue: Silvan and Rachel or Riki, Pinchas and Itamar? Will they make it on time?

39.title: Relocation
39.plot: Last Shabbat dinner at the Rosens before Shai and his family's relocation to the USA - Itamar walks home.

40.title: Phoenix Arizona
40.plot: Last Shabbat with the Hassons before Shai and Shani leave to Phoenix, the question arises: Who's going to take care of their home? Meirav or Itamar?

1.title: Coming back part 1
1.plot: Rachel, Orna and Adam pick-up the Rosens, who have returned from Phoenix Arizona, and update them about the events of the last couple of months.

2.title: Coming back part 2
2.plot: The families gather at the Rosen's home to welcome Shai and Shani, but some unresolved issues arise.

3.title: The inheritance
3.plot: The Russian minister of health died on the Hassons toilet and apparently he left some money to Menni and Alin, so everyone's nice to them.

4.title: Life or death
4.plot: Pinchas and Riki are tempted to buy graves in a new and exclusive project. Meanwhile, Shani gets unexpected money and argues with Shai whose is it.

5.title: The Baba Sali
5.plot: Silvan stars in the sports channel by correctly guessing the results on a street poll, will he surpass Paul the octopus?

6.title: Spicy sause
6.plot: Shai tries to snick Shani's spicy sauce to his mother's dinner, but he is busted and dinner blows up. Liri gets some samples of a new cream.

7.title: Tastings
7.plot: Meirav, Aharon, Rachel and Silvan go on wedding food tastings, Meirav contemplates changing her mind about getting married.

8.title: The old woman in the hallway
8.plot: Riki visits the hospital just when a news report is being shot about the state of the health system. How will everyone respond when she is mistakenly shown as the old woman in the hallway?

9.title: Bridezilla
9.plot: Meirav gathers the Hasson women and gives them tasks, in addition to fittings for the bridal party.

10.title: The investor
10.plot: Liri and Itamar bring a Chinese investor and his translator to a typical Shabbat dinner, only the Rosens are not typical and Sapir's dress is to short.

11.title: The Pinchasiada
11.plot: Shani quickly organizes a surprise birthday party for Pinchas, when Riki takes him to a restaurant and he ends up in the hospital.

12.title: Dirty dancing
12.plot: Meirav forces the Hassons to prepare a wedding dance. Meanwhile they try to figure out how much you're supposed to give you sister as a wedding gift.

13.title: The musical holiday
13.plot: Shai and Shani try to prove to their daughters that they can write a musical which is just as good as the Hanukkah musicals and shows.

14.title: Wedding movie
14.plot: Shai and Shani are making Meirav and Aharon a wedding movie.

15.title: The son
15.plot: Shai and Shani's daughter has lice again. Liri's son came back to Israel and Itamar has already fought with him. Is Itamar coming back to leaving with his parents?

16.title: Yoel
16.plot: Yosel Steinitz returns and everybody falls in love with him again. Will Meirav leave Aharon and move in with Yoel?

17.title: If I was a pirate
17.plot: Pinchas invites the Rosens to a pirate themed escape room, and everybody really wants to get out.

18.title: The dream is over
18.plot: Silvan has a surgery due to Appendicitis, but his recovery from the anesthesia is extremely difficult. Riki has to babysit the girls.

19.title: Hangover
19.plot: Aharon's bachelor party in Eilat gets out of hand, and the party goers find themselves in different parts of the country.

20.title: One wedding to late
20.plot: The wedding is about to start. Manny is trying to write the best friend's toast, so everyone is trying to help him with stories and ideas.

21.title: The safe
21.plot: The Rosens inquire whether the Hassons how much they gifted the newly-weds, and was the content of the safe stolen?

22.title: An idea as born
22.plot: The Hassons watch the promo for a new reality show - A idea is born, so Shai and Moshe apply for it. Who's going to make it?

23.title: Radio classic
23.plot: Riki invited the viola player - Kanarit, to participate in Pinchas's radio show about "Peer Gynt", and everybody's meddling in the chat meanwhile.

24.title: Costume party
24.plot: Riki throws a Purim party and reveals the truth behind her costume.

25.title: Vacation
25.plot: Everyone except Shai and Shani return from vacations around the globe. Silvan and Rachel have a semi-smart home.

26.title: 2Sweet
26.plot: Shai has a invitation for 2 for the restaurant "2Seet" and invites Adam and Sapir. Itamar moves in with his parents just when they're hosting Vera and Marchel.

27.title: Lier lawyers
27.plot: The lawyer Mendel and his daughter are helping the Hassons preventing Aharon from becoming a protected tenant, and Shani and Shai with their problem with their neighbor.

28.title: Slik
28.plot: Shai tries to re-unite with Shani at his parents home after going to the Hassons, only the way is blocked due to a Slik detonation.

29.title: Shabbat money
29.plot: A movie Shani uploaded to the internet, starting Manny and Moshe, has become viral. But who's going to get the money for the video?

30.title: Shih Tzu
30.plot: Liri received an expensive dog as a gift for signing a deal with an Indian company. Sapir and Adam need to set a wedding date.

31.title: 50 shades of Rachel
31.plot: The Hassons find an erotic diary in Rachel's closet, and in the living room everybody's trying to install a very dumb smart box.

32.title: Coming to cook
32.plot: Israel Aharoni comes to shoot a new show in Rachel's kitchen. Also, does Shai have a chance in a land raffle in Shvidnitza?

33.title: Good point
33.plot: Riki has new neighbors whose renovations are very loud. Pinchas does a little spying and finds out the neighbor is a judge.

34.title: Boidem
34.plot: While cleaning the Boidem in the Hassons home, Shani found a list she made at the age of 18 in which she listed all things she wants to accomplish before the age of 40. Will she make peace?

35.title: Toccata and Fugue
35.plot: Itamar and Liri are hiding in Pinchas's radio room. Riki needs one of the granddaughter to participate in a fashion show with her, and Adam realizes someone is watching the house.

36.title: Independence day
36.plot: Independence day tribute to the bible competition and Burekas movies.

37.title: Jazz
37.plot: How did Sapir and Adam meet? Shai and Shani try to tell it in a "clean" way.

38.plot: Shani is 40 years old. Will there be a surprise party or a family dinner in an agreed Kosher restaurant?

39.title: 10 years later Part 1
39.plot: The episode which is 10 years ahead of its time.

40.title: 10 years later Part 2
40.plot: Taking place at the wedding of Shai and Shani's pregnant daughter, 10 years later.

imdb.plot outline: The series follows Shay and Shani who go to Friday dinner. Shani's family is a Mizrahi Family, and Shay's family is an Ashkenazi family. There are episodes that they go to Shay's family the Rosens, and there are episodes that they go to Shani's family the Hassons.
imdb.title: Sabri Maranan
plot: The series follows Shay and Shani who go to Friday dinner. Shani's family is a Mizrahi Family, and Shay's family is an Ashkenazi family. There are episodes that they go to Shay's family the Rosens, and there are episodes that they go to Shani's family the Hassons.
